data.title: Twitter takes on diversity problem with engineering apprenticeship program for women and minorities
data.text: Twitter on Wednesday announced an apprenticeship program designed to bring up-and-coming talent to its engineering and data science teams.

data.title: The Wall Street Journal: White House social-media summit’s likely target: Big Tech
data.text: A “Social Media Summit” at the White House this week will offer a platform for supporters of President Trump who say they face censorship by left-tilting Big Tech—and a preview of a likely theme in Trump’s re-election campaign.

data.title: Key Levels for Twitter Stock in the Second Half of 2019
data.text: The social media platform will look to continue its streak of three consecutive earnings beats when it reports results on July 26.

data.title: Final Trades: Citigroup, JPMorgan, KRE & Twitter
data.text: The "Fast Money" traders share their final trades of the day including JPM, TWTR, and more
